title: Flash Flood Risk in Residential Area
description: Heavy rainfall causing water accumulation near creek. Water level rising rapidly, threatening nearby homes. Residents need immediate evacuation assistance.

title: Illegal Logging Activity Detected
description: Suspicious tree cutting activity observed in forested area. Multiple trees have been cut down illegally, increasing flood and landslide risk.

title: River Overflow - Flood Warning
description: River water level critically high after continuous rainfall. Nearby agricultural lands and homes at risk of flooding. Immediate monitoring required.

title: Forest Fire Smoke Detected
description: Smoke spotted in forested hillside area. Possible forest fire or slash-and-burn activity. Fire spreading risk due to dry season conditions.

title: Drainage System Clogged - Flood Risk
description: Main drainage canal blocked by debris and sediment. Heavy rain will cause immediate flooding in low-lying residential areas.

title: Deforestation in Watershed Area
description: Large-scale tree cutting observed in critical watershed zone. This will severely impact water retention and increase flood risk downstream.

title: Wildfire Threat - Dry Vegetation
description: Extremely dry grassland and vegetation posing high wildfire risk. Strong winds could spread fire rapidly to residential areas.

title: Flood Damage to Infrastructure
description: Recent flooding damaged bridge and road access. Water erosion undermining bridge foundation, posing collapse risk during next heavy rain.

title: Landslide Risk After Heavy Rain
description: Soil erosion and cracks appearing on hillside after deforestation. High risk of landslide threatening homes below during next rainfall.

title: Flash Flood in Agricultural Area
description: Sudden flooding destroying crops and farmland. Water from upland deforestation rushing down, no natural barriers to slow flow.

title: Slash-and-Burn Agriculture Detected
description: Farmers burning forest area for agriculture. Fire spreading uncontrolled, threatening nearby forest and increasing erosion risk.

title: Creek Blockage Causing Flood
description: Natural creek blocked by fallen trees and debris. Water backing up and flooding nearby homes. Urgent clearing needed.

title: Forest Fire Active - Evacuation Needed
description: Active forest fire spreading rapidly due to strong winds. Multiple families need evacuation. Fire approaching residential zone.

title: Riverbank Erosion - Flood Risk
description: Severe riverbank erosion after illegal sand mining. River widening and threatening to flood nearby houses during heavy rain.

title: Illegal Timber Harvesting
description: Commercial logging operation without permit. Large trees being cut in protected forest area, severe environmental damage and flood risk.
